channel.title: Anonymizer on Yarra Framework
channel.description: Recent content in Anonymizer on Yarra Framework

item.title: Yarra Client Tools
item.description: The Yarra Client Tools (YCT) are now available for download. Yarra Client Tools are small command-line tools that help with processing Siemens Twix files. They provide functions for batch anonymization, protocol extraction, and for displaying individual scan parameters. The package should be extracted into the installation folder of the Yarra Client package. The version is now available in the Download section.
